subject: Why can't I choose shipping to Poland?
description_text: Why can't I choose shipping to Poland?

conversations.body_text: Hi MatheoYT,     Customers in Poland can place orders directly through our Polish distributor, and the products will be shipped locally from Poland.  https://fmic.pl/elektronika/simracing?product_brand=Simsonn

So there's no way to order from your website? Here in Poland, the price
difference is $200 per pedal. Then it's no longer worth it.

wt., 23 gru 2025, 00:08 użytkownik support@simsonn.com
Hi MatheoYT,  Please provide a screenshot showing the significant differences with the Poland product, and I will contact them to check.

It's no longer an issue. I ordered Simnet. You're losing a lot of Polish
customers because you don't ship to Poland, only through a distributor. I
don't understand this. Because you ship to Germany, Ukraine, and even
Haiti, but not to Poland.

śr., 24 gru 2025, 04:27 użytkownik support@simsonn.com
